SELECT jcr.id, jcr.job_time, jcr.job_status, jcr.job_org_code, sd.depart_name AS departName, d2.item_text AS jobName, jcr.job_grade FROM train_job_change_record jcr LEFT JOIN sys_dict AS d1 ON d1.dict_code = 'job_status' AND d1.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item AS d2 ON (d2.item_value = jcr.job_status AND d1.id = d2.dict_id) LEFT JOIN sys_depart AS sd ON (sd.org_code = jcr.job_org_code AND sd.del_flag = 0)
jcr.del_flag = 0 and jcr.train_archive_id = #{id}
